entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the potions master who is teaching the class. He is described as ignoring Hermione's quivering hand and being displeased with Harry's response.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student in Snape's class who is trying to answer his question about monkshood and wolfsbane. She stands up and stretches her hand towards the dungeon ceiling.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in Snape's class who is being questioned by Snape about the difference between monkshood and wolfsbane. He quietly says that he doesn't know the answer.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student in Snape's class who is laughing at Harry's response to Snape's question.

relationships.description: Harry catches Seamus's eye and they share a wink.
Snape says that a point will be taken from Gryffindor house.
